entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 60
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS AROUND 60

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 30
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
